00069 /******************** view navigation utilities *********************/
00070 
00071 static void sclip_zoom_set(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, float zoom, float location[2])
00072 {
00073     float oldzoom = sc->zoom;
00074     int width, height;
00075 
00076     sc->zoom = zoom;
00077 
00078     if (sc->zoom < 0.1f || sc->zoom > 4.0f) {
00079         /* check zoom limits */
00080         ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00081 
00082         width *= sc->zoom;
00083         height *= sc->zoom;
00084 
00085         if ((width < 4) && (height < 4))
00086             sc->zoom = oldzoom;
00087         else if ((ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin) <= sc->zoom)
00088             sc->zoom = oldzoom;
00089         else if ((ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin) <= sc->zoom)
00090             sc->zoom = oldzoom;
00091     }
00092 
00093     if ((U.uiflag & USER_ZOOM_TO_MOUSEPOS) && location) {
00094         ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00095 
00096         sc->xof += ((location[0] - 0.5f) * width-sc->xof) * (sc->zoom-oldzoom) / sc->zoom;
00097         sc->yof += ((location[1] - 0.5f) * height-sc->yof) * (sc->zoom-oldzoom) / sc->zoom;
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void sclip_zoom_set_factor(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, float zoomfac, float location[2])
00102 {
00103     sclip_zoom_set(sc, ar, sc->zoom*zoomfac, location);
00104 }
00105 
00106 static void sclip_zoom_set_factor_exec(bContext *C, wmEvent *event, float factor)
00107 {
00108     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00109     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00110     float location[2], *mpos = NULL;
00111 
00112     if (event) {
00113         ED_clip_mouse_pos(C, event, location);
00114         mpos = location;
00115     }
00116 
00117     sclip_zoom_set_factor(sc, ar, factor, mpos);
00118 
00119     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00120 }

00122 /******************** open clip operator ********************/
00123 
00124 static void clip_filesel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, const char *path)
00125 {
00126     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00127 
00128     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00129 }
00130 
00131 static void open_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00132 {
00133     PropertyPointerRNA *pprop;
00134 
00135     op->customdata = pprop = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PropertyPointerRNA), "OpenPropertyPointerRNA");
00136     uiIDContextProperty(C, &pprop->ptr, &pprop->prop);
00137 }
00138 
00139 static int open_cancel(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00140 {
00141     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00142     op->customdata = NULL;
00143 
00144     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00145 }
00146 
00147 static int open_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00148 {
00149     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00150     PropertyPointerRNA *pprop;
00151     PointerRNA idptr;
00152     MovieClip *clip = NULL;
00153     char str[FILE_MAX];
00154 
00155     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", str);
00156     /* default to frame 1 if there's no scene in context */
00157 
00158     errno = 0;
00159 
00160     clip = BKE_add_movieclip_file(str);
00161 
00162     if (!clip) {
00163         if (op->customdata)
00164             MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00165 
00166         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't read: \"%s\", %s.", str, errno ? strerror(errno) : "Unsupported movie clip format");
00167 
00168         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00169     }
00170 
00171     if (!op->customdata)
00172         open_init(C, op);
00173 
00174     /* hook into UI */
00175     pprop = op->customdata;
00176 
00177     if (pprop->prop) {
00178         /* when creating new ID blocks, use is already 1, but RNA
00179          * pointer se also increases user, so this compensates it */
00180         clip->id.us--;
00181 
00182         RNA_id_pointer_create(&clip->id, &idptr);
00183         RNA_property_pointer_set(&pprop->ptr, pprop->prop, idptr);
00184         RNA_property_update(C, &pprop->ptr, pprop->prop);
00185     }
00186     else if (sc) {
00187         ED_space_clip_set(C, sc, clip);
00188     }
00189 
00190     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_ADDED, clip);
00191 
00192     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00193 
00194     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00195 }
00196 
00197 static int open_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00198 {
00199     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00200     char *path = U.textudir;
00201     MovieClip *clip = NULL;
00202 
00203     if (sc)
00204         clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00205 
00206     if (clip)
00207         path = clip->name;
00208 
00209     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "relative_path"))
00210         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "relative_path", U.flag & USER_RELPATHS);
00211 
00212     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00213         return open_exec(C, op);
00214 
00215     open_init(C, op);
00216 
00217     clip_filesel(C, op, path);
00218 
00219     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00220 }
00221 
00222 void CLIP_OT_open(wmOperatorType *ot)
00223 {
00224     /* identifiers */
00225     ot->name = "Open Clip";
00226     ot->description = "Load a sequence of frames or a movie file";
00227     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_open";
00228 
00229     /* api callbacks */
00230     ot->exec = open_exec;
00231     ot->invoke = open_invoke;
00232     ot->cancel = open_cancel;
00233 
00234     /* flags */
00235     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00236 
00237     /* properties */
00238     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE|IMAGEFILE|MOVIEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH|WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00239 }

00241 /******************* reload clip operator *********************/
00242 
00243 static int reload_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00244 {
00245     MovieClip *clip = CTX_data_edit_movieclip(C);
00246 
00247     if (!clip)
00248         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00249 
00250     BKE_movieclip_reload(clip);
00251 
00252     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MOVIECLIP|NA_EDITED, clip);
00253 
00254     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00255 }

00258 {
00259     /* identifiers */
00260     ot->name = "Reload Clip";
00261     ot->description = "Reload clip";
00262     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_reload";
00263 
00264     /* api callbacks */

00268 /********************** view pan operator *********************/
00269 
00270 typedef struct ViewPanData {
00271     float x, y;
00272     float xof, yof, xorig, yorig;
00273     int event_type;
00274     float *vec;
00275 } ViewPanData;
00276 
00277 static void view_pan_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00278 {
00279     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00280     ViewPanData *vpd;
00281 
00282     op->customdata = vpd = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ViewPanData), "ClipViewPanData");
00283     WM_cursor_modal(CTX_wm_window(C), BC_NSEW_SCROLLCURSOR);
00284 
00285     vpd->x = event->x;
00286     vpd->y = event->y;
00287 
00288     if (sc->flag & SC_LOCK_SELECTION)
00289         vpd->vec= &sc->xlockof;
00290     else
00291         vpd->vec= &sc->xof;
00292 
00293     copy_v2_v2(&vpd->xof, vpd->vec);
00294     copy_v2_v2(&vpd->xorig, &vpd->xof);
00295 
00296     vpd->event_type= event->type;
00297 
00298     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00299 }
00300 
00301 static void view_pan_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int cancel)
00302 {
00303     ViewPanData *vpd = op->customdata;
00304 
00305     if (cancel) {
00306         copy_v2_v2(vpd->vec, &vpd->xorig);
00307 
00308         ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00309     }
00310 
00311     WM_cursor_restore(CTX_wm_window(C));
00312     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00313 }
00314 
00315 static int view_pan_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00316 {
00317     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00318     float offset[2];
00319 
00320     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "offset", offset);
00321 
00322     if (sc->flag & SC_LOCK_SELECTION) {
00323         sc->xlockof += offset[0];
00324         sc->ylockof += offset[1];
00325     }
00326     else {
00327         sc->xof += offset[0];
00328         sc->yof += offset[1];
00329     }
00330 
00331     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00332 
00333     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00334 }
00335 
00336 static int view_pan_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00337 {
00338     if (event->type == MOUSEPAN) {
00339         SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00340         float offset[2];
00341 
00342         offset[0] = (event->x - event->prevx) / sc->zoom;
00343         offset[1] = (event->y - event->prevy) / sc->zoom;
00344 
00345         RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "offset", offset);
00346 
00347         view_pan_exec(C, op);
00348 
00349         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00350     }
00351     else {
00352         view_pan_init(C, op, event);
00353 
00354         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 static int view_pan_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00359 {
00360     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00361     ViewPanData *vpd = op->customdata;
00362     float offset[2];
00363 
00364     switch(event->type) {
00365         case MOUSEMOVE:
00366             copy_v2_v2(vpd->vec, &vpd->xorig);
00367             offset[0] = (vpd->x - event->x) / sc->zoom;
00368             offset[1] = (vpd->y - event->y) / sc->zoom;
00369             RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "offset", offset);
00370             view_pan_exec(C, op);
00371             break;
00372         case ESCKEY:
00373             view_pan_exit(C, op, 1);
00374 
00375             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00376         case SPACEKEY:
00377             view_pan_exit(C, op, 0);
00378 
00379             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00380         default:
00381             if (event->type == vpd->event_type &&  event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
00382                 view_pan_exit(C, op, 0);
00383 
00384                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00385             }
00386             break;
00387     }
00388 
00389     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00390 }
00391 
00392 static int view_pan_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00393 {
00394     view_pan_exit(C, op, 1);
00395 
00396     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00397 }
00398 
00399 void CLIP_OT_view_pan(wmOperatorType *ot)
00400 {
00401     /* identifiers */
00402     ot->name = "View Pan";
00403     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_view_pan";
00404 
00405     /* api callbacks */
00406     ot->exec = view_pan_exec;
00407     ot->invoke = view_pan_invoke;
00408     ot->modal = view_pan_modal;
00409     ot->cancel = view_pan_cancel;
00410     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00411 
00412     /* flags */
00413     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
00414 
00415     /* properties */
00416     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "offset", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
00417         "Offset", "Offset in floating point units, 1.0 is the width and height of the image", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00418 }

00420 /********************** view zoom operator *********************/
00421 
00422 typedef struct ViewZoomData {
00423     float x, y;
00424     float zoom;
00425     int event_type;
00426     float location[2];
00427 } ViewZoomData;
00428 
00429 static void view_zoom_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00430 {
00431     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00432     ViewZoomData *vpd;
00433 
00434     op->customdata= vpd= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ViewZoomData), "ClipViewZoomData");
00435     WM_cursor_modal(CTX_wm_window(C), BC_NSEW_SCROLLCURSOR);
00436 
00437     vpd->x = event->x;
00438     vpd->y = event->y;
00439     vpd->zoom = sc->zoom;
00440     vpd->event_type = event->type;
00441 
00442     ED_clip_mouse_pos(C, event, vpd->location);
00443 
00444     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00445 }
00446 
00447 static void view_zoom_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int cancel)
00448 {
00449     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00450     ViewZoomData *vpd = op->customdata;
00451 
00452     if (cancel) {
00453         sc->zoom = vpd->zoom;
00454         ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00455     }
00456 
00457     WM_cursor_restore(CTX_wm_window(C));
00458     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00459 }
00460 
00461 static int view_zoom_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00462 {
00463     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00464     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00465 
00466     sclip_zoom_set_factor(sc, ar, RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "factor"), NULL);
00467 
00468     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00469 
00470     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00471 }
00472 
00473 static int view_zoom_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00474 {
00475     if (event->type == MOUSEZOOM) {
00476         float factor;
00477 
00478         factor = 1.0f + (event->x - event->prevx + event->y - event->prevy) / 300.0f;
00479         RNA_float_set(op->ptr, "factor", factor);
00480 
00481         sclip_zoom_set_factor_exec(C, event, factor);
00482 
00483         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00484     }
00485     else {
00486         view_zoom_init(C, op, event);
00487 
00488         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00489     }
00490 }
00491 
00492 static int view_zoom_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00493 {
00494     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00495     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00496     ViewZoomData *vpd = op->customdata;
00497     float factor;
00498 
00499     switch(event->type) {
00500         case MOUSEMOVE:
00501             factor = 1.0f + (vpd->x-event->x + vpd->y - event->y) / 300.0f;
00502             RNA_float_set(op->ptr, "factor", factor);
00503             sclip_zoom_set(sc, ar, vpd->zoom * factor, vpd->location);
00504             ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00505             break;
00506         default:
00507             if (event->type == vpd->event_type && event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
00508                 view_zoom_exit(C, op, 0);
00509 
00510                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00511             }
00512             break;
00513     }
00514 
00515     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00516 }
00517 
00518 static int view_zoom_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00519 {
00520     view_zoom_exit(C, op, 1);
00521 
00522     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00523 }

00526 {

00529     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_view_zoom";
00530 
00531     /* api callbacks */
00532     ot->exec = view_zoom_exec;
00533     ot->invoke = view_zoom_invoke;
00534     ot->modal = view_zoom_modal;
00535     ot->cancel = view_zoom_cancel;
00536     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00537 
00538     /* flags */
00539     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING|OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
00540 
00541     /* properties */
00542     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "factor", 0.0f, 0.0f, FLT_MAX,
00543         "Factor", "Zoom factor, values higher than 1.0 zoom in, lower values zoom out", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00544 }

00628 /********************** view zoom ratio operator *********************/
00629 
00630 static int view_zoom_ratio_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00631 {
00632     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00633     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00634 
00635     sclip_zoom_set(sc, ar, RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "ratio"), NULL);
00636 
00637     /* ensure pixel exact locations for draw */
00638     sc->xof= (int) sc->xof;
00639     sc->yof= (int) sc->yof;
00640 
00641     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00642 
00643     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00644 }
00645 
00646 void CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio(wmOperatorType *ot)
00647 {
00648     /* identifiers */
00649     ot->name = "View Zoom Ratio";
00650     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio";
00651 
00652     /* api callbacks */
00653     ot->exec = view_zoom_ratio_exec;
00654     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00655 
00656     /* properties */
00657     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "ratio", 0.0f, 0.0f, FLT_MAX,
00658         "Ratio", "Zoom ratio, 1.0 is 1:1, higher is zoomed in, lower is zoomed out", -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00659 }
00660 
00661 /********************** view all operator *********************/
00662 
00663 static int view_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00664 {
00665     SpaceClip *sc;
00666     ARegion *ar;
00667     int w, h, width, height;
00668     float aspx, aspy;
00669     int fit_view= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "fit_view");
00670     float zoomx, zoomy;
00671 
00672     /* retrieve state */
00673     sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00674     ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00675 
00676     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &w, &h);
00677     ED_space_clip_aspect(sc, &aspx, &aspy);
00678 
00679     w = w * aspx;
00680     h = h * aspy;
00681 
00682     /* check if the image will fit in the image with zoom==1 */
00683     width = ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1;
00684     height = ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin + 1;
00685 
00686     if (fit_view) {
00687         const int margin = 5; /* margin from border */
00688 
00689         zoomx= (float) width / (w + 2 * margin);
00690         zoomy= (float) height / (h + 2 * margin);
00691 
00692         sclip_zoom_set(sc, ar, MIN2(zoomx, zoomy), NULL);
00693     }
00694     else {
00695         if ((w >= width || h >= height) && (width > 0 && height > 0)) {
00696             zoomx= (float) width / w;
00697             zoomy= (float) height / h;
00698 
00699             /* find the zoom value that will fit the image in the image space */
00700             sclip_zoom_set(sc, ar, 1.0f/power_of_2(1/MIN2(zoomx, zoomy)), NULL);
00701         }
00702         else
00703             sclip_zoom_set(sc, ar, 1.0f, NULL);
00704     }
00705 
00706     sc->xof = sc->yof = 0.0f;
00707 
00708     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00709 
00710     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00711 }
00712 
00713 void CLIP_OT_view_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
00714 {
00715     /* identifiers */
00716     ot->name = "View All";
00717     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_view_all";
00718 
00719     /* api callbacks */
00720     ot->exec = view_all_exec;
00721     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
00722 
00723     /* properties */
00724     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "fit_view", 0, "Fit View", "Fit frame to the viewport");
00725 }
00726 
00727 /********************** view selected operator *********************/
00728 
00729 static int view_selected_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00730 {
00731     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00732     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00733 
00734     sc->xlockof = 0.0f;
00735     sc->ylockof = 0.0f;
00736 
00737     ED_clip_view_selection(sc, ar, 1);
00738     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
00739 
00740     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00741 }

00754 /********************** change frame operator *********************/
00755 
00756 static int change_frame_poll(bContext *C)
00757 {
00758     /* prevent changes during render */
00759     if (G.rendering)
00760         return 0;
00761 
00762     return ED_space_clip_poll(C);
00763 }
00764 
00765 static void change_frame_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00766 {
00767     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00768 
00769     /* set the new frame number */
00770     CFRA = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame");
00771     FRAMENUMBER_MIN_CLAMP(CFRA);
00772     SUBFRA = 0.0f;
00773 
00774     /* do updates */
00775     sound_seek_scene(CTX_data_main(C), CTX_data_scene(C));
00776     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00777 }
00778 
00779 static int change_frame_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00780 {
00781     change_frame_apply(C, op);
00782 
00783     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00784 }
00785 
00786 static int frame_from_event(bContext *C, wmEvent *event)
00787 {
00788     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00789     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00790     int framenr = 0;
00791 
00792     if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00793         float sfra = SFRA, efra = EFRA, framelen = ar->winx / (efra - sfra + 1);
00794 
00795         framenr = sfra + event->mval[0] / framelen;
00796     }
00797     else {
00798         float viewx, viewy;
00799 
00800         UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &viewx, &viewy);
00801 
00802         framenr= (int) floor(viewx + 0.5f);
00803     }
00804 
00805     return framenr;
00806 }
00807 
00808 static int change_frame_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00809 {
00810     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00811 
00812     if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00813         if (event->mval[1] > 16)
00814             return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00815     }
00816 
00817     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frame", frame_from_event(C, event));
00818 
00819     change_frame_apply(C, op);
00820 
00821     /* add temp handler */
00822     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00823 
00824     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00825 }
00826 
00827 static int change_frame_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00828 {
00829     switch (event->type) {
00830         case ESCKEY:
00831             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00832 
00833         case MOUSEMOVE:
00834             RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frame", frame_from_event(C, event));
00835             change_frame_apply(C, op);
00836             break;
00837 
00838         case LEFTMOUSE:
00839         case RIGHTMOUSE:
00840             if (event->val == KM_RELEASE)
00841                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00842             break;
00843     }
00844 
00845     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00846 }
00847 
00848 void CLIP_OT_change_frame(wmOperatorType *ot)
00849 {
00850     /* identifiers */
00851     ot->name = "Change frame";
00852     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_change_frame";
00853     ot->description = "Interactively change the current frame number";
00854 
00855     /* api callbacks */
00856     ot->exec = change_frame_exec;
00857     ot->invoke = change_frame_invoke;
00858     ot->modal = change_frame_modal;
00859     ot->poll = change_frame_poll;
00860 
00861     /* flags */
00862     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00863 
00864     /* rna */
00865     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "frame", 0, MINAFRAME, MAXFRAME, "Frame", "", MINAFRAME, MAXFRAME);
00866 }
00867 
00868 /********************** rebuild proxies operator *********************/
00869 
00870 typedef struct ProxyBuildJob {
00871     Scene *scene;
00872     struct Main *main;
00873     MovieClip *clip;
00874     int clip_flag, stop;
00875     struct IndexBuildContext *index_context;
00876 } ProxyJob;
00877 
00878 static void proxy_freejob(void *pjv)
00879 {
00880     ProxyJob *pj= pjv;
00881 
00882     MEM_freeN(pj);
00883 }
00884 
00885 static int proxy_bitflag_to_array(int size_flag, int build_sizes[4], int undistort)
00886 {
00887     int build_count = 0;
00888     int size_flags[2][4] = {{MCLIP_PROXY_SIZE_25,
00889                              MCLIP_PROXY_SIZE_50,
00890                              MCLIP_PROXY_SIZE_75,
00891                              MCLIP_PROXY_SIZE_100},
00892                             {MCLIP_PROXY_UNDISTORTED_SIZE_25,
00893                              MCLIP_PROXY_UNDISTORTED_SIZE_50,
00894                              MCLIP_PROXY_UNDISTORTED_SIZE_75,
00895                              MCLIP_PROXY_UNDISTORTED_SIZE_100}};
00896     int size_nr = undistort ? 1 : 0;
00897 
00898     if (size_flag & size_flags[size_nr][0])
00899         build_sizes[build_count++]= MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_25;
00900 
00901     if (size_flag & size_flags[size_nr][1])
00902         build_sizes[build_count++]= MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_50;
00903 
00904     if (size_flag & size_flags[size_nr][2])
00905         build_sizes[build_count++]= MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_75;
00906 
00907     if (size_flag & size_flags[size_nr][3])
00908         build_sizes[build_count++]= MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_100;
00909 
00910     return build_count;
00911 }
00912 
00913 /* only this runs inside thread */
00914 static void proxy_startjob(void *pjv, short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
00915 {
00916     ProxyJob *pj = pjv;
00917     Scene *scene = pj->scene;
00918     MovieClip *clip = pj->clip;
00919     struct MovieDistortion *distortion = NULL;
00920     short size_flag;
00921     int cfra, sfra = SFRA, efra = EFRA;
00922     int build_sizes[4], build_count = 0;
00923     int build_undistort_sizes[4], build_undistort_count = 0;
00924 
00925     size_flag = clip->proxy.build_size_flag;
00926 
00927     build_count = proxy_bitflag_to_array(size_flag, build_sizes, 0);
00928     build_undistort_count = proxy_bitflag_to_array(size_flag, build_undistort_sizes, 1);
00929 
00930     if (clip->source == MCLIP_SRC_MOVIE) {
00931         if (pj->index_context)
00932             IMB_anim_index_rebuild(pj->index_context, stop, do_update, progress);
00933 
00934         if (!build_undistort_count) {
00935             if (*stop)
00936                 pj->stop = 1;
00937 
00938             return;
00939         }
00940         else {
00941             sfra = 1;
00942             efra = IMB_anim_get_duration(clip->anim, IMB_TC_NONE);
00943         }
00944     }
00945 
00946     if (build_undistort_count)
00947         distortion = BKE_tracking_distortion_create();
00948 
00949     for (cfra = sfra; cfra <= efra; cfra++) {
00950         if (clip->source != MCLIP_SRC_MOVIE)
00951             BKE_movieclip_build_proxy_frame(clip, pj->clip_flag, NULL, cfra, build_sizes, build_count, 0);
00952 
00953         BKE_movieclip_build_proxy_frame(clip, pj->clip_flag, distortion, cfra, build_undistort_sizes, build_undistort_count, 1);
00954 
00955         if (*stop || G.afbreek)
00956             break;
00957 
00958         *do_update = TRUE;
00959         *progress= ((float) cfra) / (efra - sfra);
00960     }
00961 
00962     if (distortion)
00963         BKE_tracking_distortion_destroy(distortion);
00964 
00965     if (*stop)
00966         pj->stop = 1;
00967 }
00968 
00969 static void proxy_endjob(void *pjv)
00970 {
00971     ProxyJob *pj = pjv;
00972 
00973     if (pj->clip->anim)
00974         IMB_close_anim_proxies(pj->clip->anim);
00975 
00976     if (pj->index_context)
00977         IMB_anim_index_rebuild_finish(pj->index_context, pj->stop);
00978 
00979     BKE_movieclip_reload(pj->clip);
00980 
00981     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_MOVIECLIP|ND_DISPLAY, pj->clip);
00982 }
00983 
00984 static int clip_rebuild_proxy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00985 {
00986     wmJob * steve;
00987     ProxyJob *pj;
00988     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00989     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00990     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00991     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00992 
00993     if ((clip->flag & MCLIP_USE_PROXY) == 0)
00994         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00995 
00996     steve = WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), sa, "Building Proxies", WM_JOB_PROGRESS);
00997 
00998     pj = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ProxyJob), "proxy rebuild job");
00999     pj->scene = scene;
01000     pj->main = CTX_data_main(C);
01001     pj->clip = clip;
01002     pj->clip_flag = clip->flag & MCLIP_TIMECODE_FLAGS;
01003 
01004     if (clip->anim) {
01005         pj->index_context = IMB_anim_index_rebuild_context(clip->anim, clip->proxy.build_tc_flag,
01006                     clip->proxy.build_size_flag, clip->proxy.quality);
01007     }
01008 
01009     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, pj, proxy_freejob);
01010     WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.2, NC_MOVIECLIP|ND_DISPLAY, 0);
01011     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, proxy_startjob, NULL, NULL, proxy_endjob);
01012 
01013     G.afbreek = 0;
01014     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
01015 
01016     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
01017 
01018     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01019 }
01020 
01021 void CLIP_OT_rebuild_proxy(wmOperatorType *ot)
01022 {
01023     /* identifiers */
01024     ot->name = "Rebuild Proxy and Timecode Indices";
01025     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_rebuild_proxy";
01026     ot->description = "Rebuild all selected proxies and timecode indices in the background";
01027 
01028     /* api callbacks */
01029     ot->exec = clip_rebuild_proxy_exec;
01030     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01031 
01032     /* flags */
01033     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER;
01034 }
01035 
01036 /********************** mode set operator *********************/
01037 
01038 static int mode_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01039 {
01040     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01041     int mode = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "mode");
01042     int toggle = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "toggle");
01043 
01044     if (sc->mode == mode) {
01045         if (toggle)
01046             sc->mode = SC_MODE_TRACKING;
01047     }
01048     else {
01049         sc->mode = mode;
01050     }
01051 
01052     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE|ND_SPACE_CLIP, NULL);
01053 
01054     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01055 }
01056

01060         {SC_MODE_TRACKING, "TRACKING", 0, "Tracking", "Show tracking and solving tools"},
01061         {SC_MODE_RECONSTRUCTION, "RECONSTRUCTION", 0, "Reconstruction", "Show tracking/reconstruction tools"},
01062         {SC_MODE_DISTORTION, "DISTORTION", 0, "Distortion", "Show distortion tools"},
01063         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01064 
01065 
01066     /* identifiers */
01067     ot->name = "Set Clip Mode";
01068     ot->description = "Set the clip interaction mode";
01069     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_mode_set";
01070 
01071     /* api callbacks */
01072     ot->exec = mode_set_exec;
01073 
01074     ot->poll = ED_space_clip_poll;
01075 
01076     /* properties */
01077     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "mode", mode_items, SC_MODE_TRACKING, "Mode", "");
01078     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "toggle", 0, "Toggle", "");
01079 }
